Title: Personalized Fitness & Wellness
User Profile & Goal Setting
As a user, I want to create and manage my fitness profile by entering details like age, weight, height, fitness level, and goals,  So that the app can tailor personalized recommendations.
As a user, I want to update my progress metrics (e.g., weight, calories burned, steps taken), So that I can track my fitness journey effectively.
As a user, I want to set short-term and long-term fitness goals, So that I can stay motivated and measure my success.
AI-Powered Workout & Diet Plans
As a user, I want the app to generate personalized AI-driven workout and meal plans based on my fitness level and preferences,  So that I can follow an optimized routine.
As a user, I want to modify or swap exercises and meals from the AI-recommended plan, So that I have flexibility in my fitness routine.
As a user, I want to receive daily workout & diet reminders, So that I can stay on track with my fitness plan
Progress & Activity Tracking
As a user, I want to sync my fitness data with Google Fit, Apple Health, or my smartwatch,  So that my activities are tracked automatically.
As a user, I want to view my progress through graphs, insights, and reports, So that I can analyze my improvements over time.
As a user, I want to receive weekly/monthly progress reports,  So that I can stay informed about my fitness journey.
As a user, I want to receive daily workout & diet reminders, So that I can stay on track with my fitness plan.
Notifications & Motivational Alerts
As a user, I want to receive reminders for workouts, hydration, and meals, So that I can maintain consistency in my fitness journey.
As a user, I want the app to send motivational alerts when I achieve milestones, So that I feel encouraged to continue.
As a user, I want to customize my notification preferences, So that I only receive relevant alerts.
